product_name: REI Camp Kitchen Hooks - Package of 2
long_description: Customize the prep area of your REI Camp Kitchen (sold separately) by clamping these accessory hooks on the square mast or table legs. Use the heavy-gauge steel hooks to hang a lantern or dish towel within easy reach. Plastic sleeves provide wobble-free hold on the REI Camp Kitchen.
short_description: Customize the prep area of your REI Camp Kitchen (sold separately) by clamping these accessory hooks on the square mast or table legs.
